lines.text: Suppose you kept going another 18 billion light years, what if there's nothing out there? Suppose you kept going another trillion times further, so far out you see nothing. The light from the universe would be fainter than the faintest star. Infinitely cold. Infinitely dark. Sometimes if I wake up and it's dark, I get really scared, like I'm out there and I'm never coming back.

Here, hold onto this when you sleep. And if you wake up and you're scared, you'll say, "Wait a minute. I'm holding Eric's shoe. Why the hell would I be holding some smelly basketball shoe a trillion light years from the universe? I must be here on earth, safe in my sleeping bag, and Eric must be close by."

[crying]
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry too. I shoulda tried harder.
Tried what?
To find the cure.
Come here sweetie. You did, you did. Everything that was sent in Dexter's life was sad, alone, you made it go away. Dexter was happy to have you as a friend.

Look, history is full of very sick people, who suddenly, for no reason at all, get better. And when that happens we call it a miracle. From the moment I met you I knew you were special, and that you might be one of those people. You know I'm tellin' you the truth, don'tcha? You can feel that inside ye, can'tcha? So don't let me down, okay? I'm countin' on you to make me famous.
So, I hear your road to the Nobel Prize hit a few potholes?
More like the Grand Canyon.
Have to eat my lunch now.
Why don't you just eat whenever you're hungry?
'Cause if I only ate when I was hungry, I wouldn't be here.
There's something I have to tell you. My mom likes to call me 'Sweetie'.
Ha ha ha. "Sweetie"?
You gotta promise not to laugh.

[At dinner]
You want some more carrots, sweetie?

[as Linda goes to the kitchen; while laughing]
You didn't finish all your meat loaf, love muffin.
Would you shut up?
[Looking at a Playboy magazine]
This doesn't look like my mom.
These aren't moms. These are women. This is what they're supposed to look like.
This is stupid.

Yeah? Well, about twenty years ago there was this guy. He noticed some mold growing on his bread and he started feeding it to people. Everybody said he was stupid. You know what it turned out to be? Aspirin!
What about your little brother when he fell off the monkey bars at school and got real hurt, they had to take him to the hospital. He could've caught something then.
But he didn't.

But he could've. Then everybody would be calling him faggot and queer, and he'd get sick and die. And they'd write 'Homo' on his headstone. And when your mother went to bring him flowers, she'd see Little Eddie Horner Homo. But you know what the worst part about it would be? Probably before he died a bunch of assholes like you who ain't sick, thought it might be fun just to beat the shit out of him!
Where do bugs go to the bathroom?
It's not on leaves. Not even bugs are stupid enough to shit on their own food.

[They make a tea from some found leaves]
Tastes like crap.
No shit, don't you know where bugs go to the bathroom?
Dexter, is Erik staying for dinner?
Waka.
That means 'yes', white woman.
Dexter was laughing his ass off.
Oh, that's what happened to it. I thought he was just on a diet.

[They are opening candy bars in the store]
Are we allowed to do this?
Of course. How else you supposed to know what you're gonna get.
Hey, how much you pay for that faggot? You guys took a wrong turn. This is a 'No Homo' zone.
I ain't a homo. And neither is he. He got it from a blood transfusion.
Well then what's that awful smell?
Well see, we was walking across the grass when we accidentally stepped in your mother.
Do you have a girlfriend?
Yeah I had a girlfriend but I had to dump her, spend, spend, spend!
You'd be crazy to stab me. My blood is like poison. One drop could kill you.

[Grabbing Gail by her blouse and backing her into the wall]
I want to tell you two things. The first is Erik's best friend died today and he is going to the funeral.

[struggling]
And the second is if you ever lay a hand on that boy again I will kill you! Do you understand?
I'm not sure I understand why you have to try all this stuff too.
Don't you know anything about scientific method?
A little.
Well you have to have a control group, so you can see if the results are uniform.
Hey! What would you do if I come over there and whopped your ass?
How long would that take?
'Bout 10 seconds.
I'd wait till you're finished and then I'd continue working on my mud fort.
You mean you'd just let me beat you up?
I'd try to stop you but I probably wouldn't be able to, I'm not very big.
Well in that case it'd only take 5 seconds.
So is that what you're gonna do?
Maybe later.
Hello? You still there?
This one is the worst yet!
My grandma says, the worse it tastes, the better it works.
Your K-Mart clerk grandma?
...Drink.
Hey thanks for moving in here. Now all the kids at school call me "faggot" and walk on the other side of the hall.
I gotta live somewhere.
What's your name?
Angel.

[notices her tattoo]
You misspelt your tattoo. It doesn't say "Angel", it says "Angle".
Yeah, I'm aware of that now.

So they think I'm a faggot. And now all of a sudden I'm yelling the same stuff at them. Well they know I'm not a faggot, 'cause a faggot wouldn't yell "faggot" back. That's why you should've yelled "faggot" too.
I wouldn't feel right saying that.
Why the hell not?
[Reading a Playboy magazine]
It says she was born in 1975.
She doesn't look that old.
We really took this moron Pony to the cleaners. The money we gave him won't pay for half his gas.
This boat is FROM New Orleans. He's on his way home.
Now what makes you think that?
[Walks to the back and peers down at the sign, "Floating Bayou, New Orleans, Louisiana"]
Shit!
One time there was this kid, and he went swimming after eating, and he got a stomach cramp and he started to drown, but the sturgeon general grabbed him by his shirt and put him on the shore.
Hey, Erika. How's your new boyfriend next door?
He's not next door, he's behind me. I ain't never even seen him.
"I ain't never even seen him." Who are your neighbors then? Gomer Pyle and his brother Guber?
Eat shit.
What was that? Hey come back here, Faggot! Hey I said come back here!
Hey get out of the road! Go on!
Asshole.
So long, faggots! You got brains the size of boogers, you homo queer bastards!

[Erik and Dexter were placed on an island, roasting hot dogs]
This sucks.
[His hot dog falls into the fire]
Dammit! This isn't fair!
What?
I said THIS SUCKS!
Ooh! "This sucks". "Gross, Man".
00! When I gave you the money, you said we were going STRAIGHT to New Orleans!
So you'll get there a couple days later, it's not gonna kill you.
Shut up, ANGLE!
Hey, YOU shut up, you little shit! Want me to swim over there and pound your ass?

[fake crying]
Doctor, my friend... I think he is dead, and I don't know what to do...

[while reading the newspaper]
Some women saw that little AIDS boy at Peterson's yesterday.
It's in the newspaper?
No. Jan told me. I seen him in his yard but I didn't know he left the house.
Why can't I go see Dad?

[thinks for a moment]
Well, call him. If he says "yes," I'll put you on the next plane. You know, you and his little friend Cindy could go to the movies and get in for half price.
She's 23, Mom.
Oh, amazing. Old enough to drink.
Yeah, but she doesn't.
